description: This file declares exported API functions for the Dslh Var Record Object in a DSL Home Model implementation. It contains function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the object.

methods.name: DslhCreateVarRecord
methods.description: Creates a new Dslh Var Record object with specified container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: DslhVarroCreate
methods.description: Creates a new Dslh Var Record Object with provided context handles.

methods.name: DslhVarroRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the specified Dslh Var Record Object.

methods.name: DslhVarroEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls related objects into the Dslh Var Record Object.

methods.name: DslhVarroInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Dslh Var Record Object after creation.
